strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn and destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
strats.effect_rules: In your opponent's next Command phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the unit taking that test is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Battle Drill Recall
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If your unit Remained Stationary this turn, then until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

strats.name: Hail of Vengeance
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: No Threat Too Great
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

strats.name: Not One Backwards Step
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army within range of an objective marker.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, double the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit, but it must Remain Stationary this turn.

strats.name: Rigid Discipline
strats.when_rules: End of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can immediately make a Fall Back move of up to 6".
strats.restriction_rules: When making that move, your unit must end that move either wholly within your deployment zone or within range of an objective marker.

strats.name: Ancient Fury
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Walker model from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your model's Move, Toughness, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1 and each time your model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Mercy Is Weakness
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and when making such an attack, if the attacking model is a Vehicle, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

strats.name: Power of the Machine Spirit
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Vehicle unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: Unbowed Conviction
strats.when_rules: Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, your unit can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

strats.name: Vengeful Animus
strats.when_rules: Any phase, just after an Adeptus Astartes Vehicle model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
strats.target_rules: That Adeptus Astartes Vehicle model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model's Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

strats.name: Adaptive Strategy
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Select the Devastator Doctrine, Tactical Doctrine or Assault Doctrine. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active for that unit instead of any other Combat Doctrine that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that Combat Doctrine this battle.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Honour the Chapter
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Assault Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

strats.name: Only in Death Does Duty End
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

strats.name: Squad Tactics
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry or Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army that is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or a Normal move of up to 6" instead if it is under the effects of the Tactical Doctrine.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Storm of Fire
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Devastator Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Blitzing Fusillade
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability. If such a weapon already has this ability, until the end of the phase, that weapon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability as well.

strats.name: Full Throttle
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted or Adeptus Astartes Vehicle unit (excluding Walkers) from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit, or 9" instead if your unit is Mounted.

strats.name: Ride Hard, Ride Fast
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted or Adeptus Astartes Fly Vehicle unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

strats.name: Shock Assault
strats.when_rules: Your Charge phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for your unit and melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LANCE] ability.

strats.name: Wind-swift Evasion
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: A Deadly Prize
strats.when_rules: Start of the Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry or Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
strats.effect_rules: That objective marker is said to be Sabotaged, and remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Sabotaged and under your control, each time an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move within range of that objective marker, roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Calculated Feint
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if it is a Phobos or Scout Squad unit.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Guerrilla Tactics
strats.when_rules: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: Up to two Phobos and/or Scout Squad units from your army, or one other Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
strats.restriction_rules: Each unit selected for this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy models.

strats.name: Strike From The Shadows
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that is more than 12" away, improve the Ballistic Skill and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

strats.name: Surgical Strikes
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Burning Vengeance
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Transport unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: One unit embarked within that Transport can disembark as if it were your Movement phase, and can then shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: Crucible of Battle
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets the closest eligible target within 6", add 1 to the Wound roll.

strats.name: Immolation Protocols
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

strats.name: Onslaught of Fire
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that disembarked from a Transport this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target within 12", add 1 to the Hit roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

strats.name: Rapid Embarkation
strats.when_rules: End of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Transport unit from your army that has no models embarked within it, and one Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army wholly within 6" of that Transport.
strats.effect_rules: Your Infantry unit can embark within that Transport.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot target an Infantry unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, that cannot normally embark within that Transport, or that disembarked from a Transport this turn.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Duty and Honour
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
strats.effect_rules: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

strats.name: Heroes of the Chapter
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If your unit is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

strats.name: Legendary Fortitude
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

strats.name: Orbital Teleportarium
strats.when_rules: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.effect_rules: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model's Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

strats.name: Apoplectic Frenzy
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One World Eaters unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

strats.name: Blood Offering
strats.when_rules: Any phase.
strats.target_rules: One World Eaters unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of an objective marker you controlled. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

strats.name: For the Blood God!
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after a World Eaters unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
strats.target_rules: That World Eaters unit.
strats.effect_rules: Make a Blessings of Khorne roll. You can use the results of this roll to activate one Blessing of Khorne. That Blessing of Khorne does not count towards your maximum number of activated Blessings of Khorne, but all other rules for Blessings of Khorne apply.

strats.name: For the Skull Throne!
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One World Eaters unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets a Character, Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

strats.name: Gory Massacre
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One World Eaters unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn and destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
strats.effect_rules: In your opponent's next Command phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the unit taking that test is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

strats.name: Khorne Cares Not...
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One World Eaters unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

strats.name: Divine Intervention
strats.when_rules: Any phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adepta Sororitas Character unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: Discard 1-3 Miracle dice. At the end of the phase, set the last destroyed model from your unit back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy models. That model is set back up with a number of wounds remaining equal to the number of Miracle dice you discarded.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select Saint Celestine as the target of this Stratagem. You cannot select the same Character as the target of this Stratagem more than once per battle.

strats.name: Holy Rage
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adepta Sororitas unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

strats.name: Light of the Emperor
strats.when_rules: Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adepta Sororitas unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength. For the purposes of this Stratagem, if a unit has a Starting Strength of 1, it is considered to be below its Starting Strength while it has lost one or more wounds.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, your unit can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

strats.name: Rejoice the Fallen
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Adepta Sororitas unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: Spirit of the Martyr
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adepta Sororitas unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

strats.name: Suffering & Sacrifice
strats.when_rules: Start of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adepta Sororitas Infantry or Adepta Sororitas Walker unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model within Engagement range of your unit selects targets, it must select your unit as the target of its attacks.

strats.name: Arcane Genetic Alchemy
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Custodes Infantry unit from your army (excluding Anathema Psykana units) that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

strats.name: Avenge the Fallen
strats.when_rules: Start of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Custodes unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength and has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit. If that unit is Below Half-strength, until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of those melee weapons instead.

strats.name: Slayers of Nightmares
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Custodes unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

strats.name: Sworn Guardians
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Custodes unit from your army (excluding Anathema Psykana units) within range of an objective marker you control.
strats.effect_rules: That objective marker remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

strats.name: Unwavering Sentinels
strats.when_rules: Start of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Custodes unit from your army (excluding Anathema Psykana units) that is within range of an objective marker.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Fights First ability.

strats.name: Vigil Unending
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Custodes Infantry unit from your army (excluding Anathema Psykana units).
strats.effect_rules: One destroyed model (excluding Character models) is returned to your unit with its full wounds remaining.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot target the same unit with this Stratagem more than once per battle.

strats.name: Armoured Might
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Astra Militarum Vehicle unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

strats.name: Expert Bombardiers
strats.when_rules: Start of your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Astra Militarum unit from your army equipped with a vox-caster, and one enemy unit that is visible to that unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an Astra Militarum model from your army makes an attack with an Indirect Fire weapon that targets that enemy unit, unless the attacking model is Battle-shocked, add 1 to the Hit roll.

strats.name: Fields of Fire
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Regiment or Squadron unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: After your unit has resolved its attacks, select one enemy unit that was targeted by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is made against that enemy unit by a Regiment or Squadron model from your army, unless the attacking unit is Battle-shocked, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Inspired Command
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Astra Militarum Officer unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Your Officer can issue one Order as if it were your Command phase.
strats.restriction_rules: Your Officer cannot issue that Order to a Battle-shocked unit.

strats.name: Reinforcements!
strats.when_rules: Any phase.
strats.target_rules: One Regiment unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength and with all of its wounds remaining.
strats.restriction_rules: This Stratagem cannot be used to return destroyed Character units to Attached units.

strats.name: Suppression Fire
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Astra Militarum Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase, and one enemy unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles).
strats.effect_rules: If your Astra Militarum unit scores one or more hits against that enemy unit this phase, until the end of your opponent's next turn, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

strats.name: Aggressive Onslaught
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army, just before that unit Consolidates.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3", provided your unit ends that Consolidation move in Unit Coherency and within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Angel's Sacrifice
strats.when_rules: Any phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Character unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly Adeptus Astartes unit makes an attack that targets the enemy unit that just destroyed your Character unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Only in Death Does Duty End
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

strats.name: Red Rampage
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] and [LETHAL HITS] abilities.

strats.name: Relentless Assault
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase, just after an Adeptus Astartes unit from your army Falls Back.
strats.target_rules: That Adeptus Astartes unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge even though it Fell Back this phase.

strats.name: Adaptive Strategy
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Select the Devastator Doctrine, Tactical Doctrine or Assault Doctrine. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active for that unit instead of any other Combat Doctrine that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that Combat Doctrine this battle.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Honour the Chapter
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Assault Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

strats.name: Only in Death Does Duty End
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

strats.name: Squad Tactics
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry or Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army that is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or a Normal move of up to 6" instead if it is under the effects of the Tactical Doctrine.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Storm of Fire
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Devastator Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Blitzing Fusillade
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability. If such a weapon already has this ability, until the end of the phase, that weapon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability as well.

strats.name: Full Throttle
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted or Adeptus Astartes Vehicle unit (excluding Walkers) from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit, or 9" instead if your unit is Mounted.

strats.name: Ride Hard, Ride Fast
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted or Adeptus Astartes Fly Vehicle unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

strats.name: Shock Assault
strats.when_rules: Your Charge phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for your unit and melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LANCE] ability.

strats.name: Wind-swift Evasion
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: A Deadly Prize
strats.when_rules: Start of the Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry or Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
strats.effect_rules: That objective marker is said to be Sabotaged, and remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Sabotaged and under your control, each time an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move within range of that objective marker, roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Calculated Feint
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if it is a Phobos or Scout Squad unit.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Guerrilla Tactics
strats.when_rules: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: Up to two Phobos and/or Scout Squad units from your army, or one other Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
strats.restriction_rules: Each unit selected for this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy models.

strats.name: Strike From The Shadows
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that is more than 12" away, improve the Ballistic Skill and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

strats.name: Surgical Strikes
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Burning Vengeance
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Transport unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: One unit embarked within that Transport can disembark as if it were your Movement phase, and can then shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: Crucible of Battle
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets the closest eligible target within 6", add 1 to the Wound roll.

strats.name: Immolation Protocols
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

strats.name: Onslaught of Fire
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that disembarked from a Transport this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target within 12", add 1 to the Hit roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

strats.name: Rapid Embarkation
strats.when_rules: End of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Transport unit from your army that has no models embarked within it, and one Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army wholly within 6" of that Transport.
strats.effect_rules: Your Infantry unit can embark within that Transport.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot target an Infantry unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, that cannot normally embark within that Transport, or that disembarked from a Transport this turn.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Duty and Honour
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
strats.effect_rules: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

strats.name: Heroes of the Chapter
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If your unit is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

strats.name: Legendary Fortitude
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

strats.name: Orbital Teleportarium
strats.when_rules: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Terrifying Proficiency
strats.when_rules: Your Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn and destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
strats.effect_rules: In your opponent's next Command phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the unit taking that test is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Battle Drill Recall
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If your unit Remained Stationary this turn, then until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

strats.name: Hail of Vengeance
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: No Threat Too Great
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

strats.name: Not One Backwards Step
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army within range of an objective marker.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, double the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit, but it must Remain Stationary this turn.

strats.name: Rigid Discipline
strats.when_rules: End of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can immediately make a Fall Back move of up to 6".
strats.restriction_rules: When making that move, your unit must end that move either wholly within your deployment zone or within range of an objective marker.

strats.name: Ancient Fury
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Walker model from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your model's Move, Toughness, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1 and each time your model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Mercy Is Weakness
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and when making such an attack, if the attacking model is a Vehicle, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

strats.name: Power of the Machine Spirit
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Vehicle unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: Unbowed Conviction
strats.when_rules: Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, your unit can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

strats.name: Vengeful Animus
strats.when_rules: Any phase, just after an Adeptus Astartes Vehicle model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
strats.target_rules: That Adeptus Astartes Vehicle model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model's Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

strats.name: Acrobatic Display
strats.when_rules: Your Charge phase.
strats.target_rules: One Wych Cult unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge even if it Fell Back or Advanced this turn.

strats.name: Alliance of Agony
strats.when_rules: Start of any phase.
strats.target_rules: One Archon, one Succubus and one Haemonculus from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Discard one Pain token from your Pain token pool. Until the end of the phase, all three of those models' units are Empowered.
strats.restriction_rules: You can only use this Stratagem if you are able to select all three of the target models stated above.

strats.name: Insensible to Pain
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Haemonculus Covens unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

strats.name: Prey on the Weak
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Kabal unit from your army and one enemy unit that is Below Half-strength.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

strats.name: Quicksilver Reactions
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Drukhari unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot target a Haemonculus Covens unit from your army for this Stratagem.

strats.name: Strike and Fade
strats.when_rules: End of your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Drukhari unit from your army (excluding Aircraft).
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can immediately make a Normal move.
strats.restriction_rules: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge and that unit cannot embark within a Transport at the end of this move.

strats.name: Night Shield
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Drukhari Vehicle unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, your unit has a 4+ invulnerable save.

strats.name: Pounce on the Prey
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase, just after a Drukhari Infantry unit from your army disembarks from a Transport that made a Normal move this phase.
strats.target_rules: That Infantry unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge.

strats.name: Skyborne Annihilation
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Drukhari unit from your army that disembarked from a Transport this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [Sustained Hits 1] ability, or the [Sustained Hits 2] ability instead if it is a Kabalite Warriors unit.

strats.name: Swooping Mockery
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
strats.target_rules: One Drukhari Transport from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
strats.effect_rules: Your Transport can make a Normal move of up to 6".

strats.name: Vicious Blades
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after a Drukhari Transport from your army has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: That Transport.
strats.effect_rules: After your Transport has fought, select one enemy unit that was the target of one or more of those attacks and roll one D6 for each model embarked within your Transport, adding 1 to the result if that embarked model is a Wracks model: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

strats.name: Wraithlike Retreat
strats.when_rules: End of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Drukhari Infantry unit from your army that fought this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move, but unless it is a Wyches unit, it must end that move wholly within 3" horizontally and 5 vertically of a friendly Drukhari Transport and must embark within that Transport at the end of that move.

strats.name: Death from the Warp
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: Grey Knights Psyker unit from your army that either Advanced this turn or arrived using the Deep Strike or Teleport Assault abilities this turn.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

strats.name: Haloed in Soulfire
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Grey Knights Psyker unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike or Teleport Assault abilities this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the start of your next Movement phase, your unit cannot be targeted by ranged attacks unless the attacking model is within 12".

strats.name: Mists of Deimos
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
strats.target_rules: One Grey Knights Psyker unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6" as if it were your Movement phase or, if it has the Deep Strike ability, it can be placed into Strategic Reserves.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Prognisticated Arrival
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Grey Knights Psyker unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike or Teleport Assault abilities this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 3" horizontally away from all enemy models.
strats.restriction_rules: A unit targeted by this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

strats.name: Radiant Strike
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Grey Knights Psyker unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit with the [PSYCHIC] ability also have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

strats.name: Truesilver Armour
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Grey Knights unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Ancestral Sentence
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Leagues of Votann unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that has one or more Judgement tokens, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.

strats.name: Newfound Nemesis
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Leagues of Votann Infantry or Leagues of Votann Mounted unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: The attacking unit gains 1 Judgement token, or up to 2 Judgement tokens instead if that Leagues of Votann unit contained your Warlord when it was targeted by those attacks.

strats.name: Ordered Retreat
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase, just after a Leagues of Votann unit from your army Falls Back.
strats.target_rules: That Leagues of Votann unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge.

strats.name: Reactive Reprisal
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit that has one or more Judgement tokens has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Leagues of Votann unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Your Leagues of Votann unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target the enemy unit that just attacked it, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: Void Armour
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Leagues of Votann unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your Leagues of Votann unit, worsen the Armour Penteration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Warrior Pride
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Leagues of Votann unit from your army, and one enemy unit that has one or more Judgement tokens and is within Engagement Range of that Leagues of Votann unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1 for each Judgement token that enemy unit has.

strats.name: Adaptive Strategy
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Select the Devastator Doctrine, Tactical Doctrine or Assault Doctrine. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active for that unit instead of any other Combat Doctrine that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that Combat Doctrine this battle.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Honour the Chapter
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Assault Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

strats.name: Only in Death Does Duty End
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

strats.name: Squad Tactics
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry or Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army that is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or a Normal move of up to 6" instead if it is under the effects of the Tactical Doctrine.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Storm of Fire
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Devastator Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Blitzing Fusillade
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability. If such a weapon already has this ability, until the end of the phase, that weapon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability as well.

strats.name: Full Throttle
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted or Adeptus Astartes Vehicle unit (excluding Walkers) from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit, or 9" instead if your unit is Mounted.

strats.name: Ride Hard, Ride Fast
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted or Adeptus Astartes Fly Vehicle unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

strats.name: Shock Assault
strats.when_rules: Your Charge phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for your unit and melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LANCE] ability.

strats.name: Wind-swift Evasion
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: A Deadly Prize
strats.when_rules: Start of the Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry or Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
strats.effect_rules: That objective marker is said to be Sabotaged, and remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Sabotaged and under your control, each time an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move within range of that objective marker, roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Calculated Feint
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if it is a Phobos or Scout Squad unit.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Guerrilla Tactics
strats.when_rules: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: Up to two Phobos and/or Scout Squad units from your army, or one other Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
strats.restriction_rules: Each unit selected for this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy models.

strats.name: Strike From The Shadows
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that is more than 12" away, improve the Ballistic Skill and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

strats.name: Surgical Strikes
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Burning Vengeance
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Transport unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: One unit embarked within that Transport can disembark as if it were your Movement phase, and can then shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: Crucible of Battle
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets the closest eligible target within 6", add 1 to the Wound roll.

strats.name: Immolation Protocols
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

strats.name: Onslaught of Fire
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that disembarked from a Transport this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target within 12", add 1 to the Hit roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

strats.name: Rapid Embarkation
strats.when_rules: End of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Transport unit from your army that has no models embarked within it, and one Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army wholly within 6" of that Transport.
strats.effect_rules: Your Infantry unit can embark within that Transport.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot target an Infantry unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, that cannot normally embark within that Transport, or that disembarked from a Transport this turn.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Duty and Honour
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
strats.effect_rules: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

strats.name: Heroes of the Chapter
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If your unit is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

strats.name: Legendary Fortitude
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

strats.name: Orbital Teleportarium
strats.when_rules: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Terrifying Proficiency
strats.when_rules: Your Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn and destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
strats.effect_rules: In your opponent's next Command phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the unit taking that test is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Battle Drill Recall
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If your unit Remained Stationary this turn, then until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

strats.name: Hail of Vengeance
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: No Threat Too Great
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

strats.name: Not One Backwards Step
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army within range of an objective marker.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, double the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit, but it must Remain Stationary this turn.

strats.name: Rigid Discipline
strats.when_rules: End of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can immediately make a Fall Back move of up to 6".
strats.restriction_rules: When making that move, your unit must end that move either wholly within your deployment zone or within range of an objective marker.

strats.name: Ancient Fury
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Walker model from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your model's Move, Toughness, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1 and each time your model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
