strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Mercy Is Weakness
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and when making such an attack, if the attacking model is a Vehicle, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

strats.name: Power of the Machine Spirit
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Vehicle unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: Unbowed Conviction
strats.when_rules: Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, your unit can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

strats.name: Vengeful Animus
strats.when_rules: Any phase, just after an Adeptus Astartes Vehicle model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
strats.target_rules: That Adeptus Astartes Vehicle model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model's Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

strats.name: Combat Embarkation
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
strats.target_rules: One T'au Empire Infantry unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge, and one friendly Transport.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can embark within that Transport. If it does, your opponent can select new targets for that charge.
strats.restriction_rules: Every model in your T'au Empire Infantry unit must be within 3" of that Transport and there must be sufficient transport capacity to embark the entire unit.

strats.name: Coordinate to Engage
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One T'au Empire unit from your army that has just been selected as an Observer unit (see For the Greater Good).
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit, improve the Ballistic Skill characteristic of that attack by 1 and, if your unit has the Markerlight keyword, that attack has the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

strats.name: Photon Grenades
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
strats.target_rules: One T'au Empire Grenades unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge.
strats.effect_rules: That enemy unit must immediately take a Battle-shock test, and until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit.

strats.name: Point-blank Ambush
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One T'au Empire unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot use this Stratagem during the first or second battle rounds.

strats.name: Stimm Injectors
strats.when_rules: Fight phase or your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One T'au Empire Battlesuit unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.

strats.name: Strike and Fade
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One T'au Empire Battlesuit unit from your army that can Fly whose attacks have been resolved this phase.
strats.effect_rules: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move. If it does, your unit cannot declare a charge this turn.

strats.name: Adaptive Strategy
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Select the Devastator Doctrine, Tactical Doctrine or Assault Doctrine. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active for that unit instead of any other Combat Doctrine that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that Combat Doctrine this battle.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Honour the Chapter
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Assault Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

strats.name: Only in Death Does Duty End
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

strats.name: Squad Tactics
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry or Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army that is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or a Normal move of up to 6" instead if it is under the effects of the Tactical Doctrine.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Storm of Fire
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. If your unit is under the effects of the Devastator Doctrine, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1 as well.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Blitzing Fusillade
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability. If such a weapon already has this ability, until the end of the phase, that weapon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability as well.

strats.name: Full Throttle
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted or Adeptus Astartes Vehicle unit (excluding Walkers) from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit, or 9" instead if your unit is Mounted.

strats.name: Ride Hard, Ride Fast
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted or Adeptus Astartes Fly Vehicle unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

strats.name: Shock Assault
strats.when_rules: Your Charge phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for your unit and melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LANCE] ability.

strats.name: Wind-swift Evasion
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: A Deadly Prize
strats.when_rules: Start of the Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry or Adeptus Astartes Mounted unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
strats.effect_rules: That objective marker is said to be Sabotaged, and remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Sabotaged and under your control, each time an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move within range of that objective marker, roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Calculated Feint
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if it is a Phobos or Scout Squad unit.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Guerrilla Tactics
strats.when_rules: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: Up to two Phobos and/or Scout Squad units from your army, or one other Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
strats.restriction_rules: Each unit selected for this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy models.

strats.name: Strike From The Shadows
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that is more than 12" away, improve the Ballistic Skill and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

strats.name: Surgical Strikes
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Burning Vengeance
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Transport unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: One unit embarked within that Transport can disembark as if it were your Movement phase, and can then shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: Crucible of Battle
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets the closest eligible target within 6", add 1 to the Wound roll.

strats.name: Immolation Protocols
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

strats.name: Onslaught of Fire
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that disembarked from a Transport this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target within 12", add 1 to the Hit roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

strats.name: Rapid Embarkation
strats.when_rules: End of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Transport unit from your army that has no models embarked within it, and one Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army wholly within 6" of that Transport.
strats.effect_rules: Your Infantry unit can embark within that Transport.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot target an Infantry unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, that cannot normally embark within that Transport, or that disembarked from a Transport this turn.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Duty and Honour
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
strats.effect_rules: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

strats.name: Heroes of the Chapter
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If your unit is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

strats.name: Legendary Fortitude
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

strats.name: Orbital Teleportarium
strats.when_rules: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Terrifying Proficiency
strats.when_rules: Your Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Terminator, Bladeguard Veteran Squad, Sternguard Veteran Squad or Vanguard Veteran Squad unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn and destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
strats.effect_rules: In your opponent's next Command phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the unit taking that test is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Battle Drill Recall
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If your unit Remained Stationary this turn, then until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

strats.name: Hail of Vengeance
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: No Threat Too Great
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

strats.name: Not One Backwards Step
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Infantry unit from your army within range of an objective marker.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, double the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit, but it must Remain Stationary this turn.

strats.name: Rigid Discipline
strats.when_rules: End of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can immediately make a Fall Back move of up to 6".
strats.restriction_rules: When making that move, your unit must end that move either wholly within your deployment zone or within range of an objective marker.

strats.name: Ancient Fury
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Walker model from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your model's Move, Toughness, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1 and each time your model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

strats.name: Armour of Contempt
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Mercy Is Weakness
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and when making such an attack, if the attacking model is a Vehicle, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

strats.name: Power of the Machine Spirit
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes Vehicle unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: Unbowed Conviction
strats.when_rules: Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Astartes unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, your unit can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

strats.name: Vengeful Animus
strats.when_rules: Any phase, just after an Adeptus Astartes Vehicle model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
strats.target_rules: That Adeptus Astartes Vehicle model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model's Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

strats.name: Corrupt Realspace
strats.when_rules: Start of any Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Legiones Daemonica unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
strats.effect_rules: That objective marker is said to be Corrupted and remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. In addition, while an objective marker is Corrupted and under your control, the area of the battlefield within 6" of that objective marker is considered to be within your army's Shadow of Chaos.

strats.name: Daemonic Invulnerability
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Legiones Daemonica unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an invulnerable saving throw is made for a model in your unit, re-roll a saving throw of 1.

strats.name: Denizens of the Warp
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Legiones Daemonica unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 3" horizontally away from all enemy models.
strats.restriction_rules: A unit targeted by this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

strats.name: Draught of Terror
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Legiones Daemonica unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1. In addition, until the end of the phase, each time such a weapon targets a unit that is Battle-shocked, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

strats.name: The Realm of Chaos
strats.when_rules: End of your opponent's turn.
strats.target_rules: Up to two Legiones Daemonica units from your army that are within your army's Shadow of Chaos, or one other Legiones Daemonica unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves. They will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units with this Stratagem.

strats.name: Warp Surge
strats.when_rules: Your Charge phase.
strats.target_rules: One Legiones Daemonica unit from your army that is within your army's Shadow of Chaos.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

strats.name: Adrenal Surge
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: Up to two Tyranids units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army and are eligible to fight, or one other Tyranids unit from your army that is eligible to fight.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in any of those selected units makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

strats.name: Death Frenzy
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Tyranids unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

strats.name: Endless Swarm
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: Up to two Endless Multitude units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army, or one other Endless Multitude unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: You can return up to D3+3 destroyed models to each of those selected units.

strats.name: Overrun
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just before a Tyranids unit from your army Consolidates.
strats.target_rules: That Tyranids unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Consolidates, models in it can move an additional 3" as long as your unit can end that move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. If your unit is within Synapse Range of your army and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, instead of making that Consolidation move, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

strats.name: Predatory Imperative
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: Up to two Tyranids units from your army that are within Synapse Range of your army, or one other Tyranids unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Select one Hyper-adaptation. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Hyper-adaptation is active for those selected units in addition to any other that may be active for your army.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot select the same Hyper-adaptation you selected at the start of the first battle round.

strats.name: Rapid Regeneration
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Tyranids unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. If your unit is within Synapse Range of your army, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability instead.

strats.name: Assassin Beasts
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Vanguard Invader Infantry unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

strats.name: Hypersensory Scillia
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
strats.target_rules: Up to two Vanguard Invader units from your army that are within 9" of that enemy unit, or one other Tyranids Infantry unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Those selected units can each make a Normal move of up to 6".
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Invisible Hunter
strats.when_rules: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: Up to two Vanguard Invader units from your army, or one Tyranids Infantry unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
strats.restriction_rules: The targeted units must be more than 3" away from all enemy units.

strats.name: Seeded Broods
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Tyranids unit from your army that is in Reserves, or up to two Vanguard Invader units from your army that are in Reserves.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, for the purposes of setting up those selected units on the battlefield, treat the current battle round number as being one higher than it actually is.

strats.name: Surprise Assault
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Vanguard Invader unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll. If the Battle-shock test was failed, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

strats.name: Unseen Lurkers
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Vanguard Invader unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 12" or, if your unit has the Lone Operative ability, if the attacking model is within 6". Your opponent can select new targets for the attacking unit's attacks.

strats.name: Ablative Carapace
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Harvester unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability. If your unit is within range of an objective marker you control, until the end of the phase models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability instead.

strats.name: Broodguard Impulse
strats.when_rules: Any phase.
strats.target_rules: One Harvester unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly Tyranids model makes an attack that targets the enemy unit that just destroyed your Harvester unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

strats.name: Rapacious Hunger
strats.when_rules: Your Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Tyranids unit from your army that just destroyed an enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit immediately Regenerates (See Feed the Swarm). When doing so, if your unit is a Harvester unit and you choose for one model to regain up to D3 lost wounds, that model regains up to 3 lost wounds instead.

strats.name: Reclaim Biomass
strats.when_rules: Any phase, when a Tyranids unit from your army is destroyed, before the last model in it is removed from play.
strats.target_rules: One Harvester unit from your army that is within 6" of that destroyed unit.
strats.effect_rules: Regenerate one friendly Tyranids unit within 6" of your Harvester unit (See Feed the Swarm).

strats.name: Secure Biomass
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Tyranids unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. If your unit is a Harvester unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit as well.

strats.name: Tyrannoformed
strats.when_rules: Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Harvester unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
strats.effect_rules: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

strats.name: Corrosive Viscera
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a Tyranids Monster model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability that cannot Fly is destroyed.
strats.target_rules: That Tyranids Monster model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model's Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

strats.name: Massive Impact
strats.when_rules: Your Charge phase, just after a Tyranids Monster model from your army ends a Charge move.
strats.target_rules: That Tyranids Monster model.
strats.effect_rules: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your model and roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

strats.name: Rampaging Monstrosities
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Tyranids Monster unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

strats.name: Savage Roar
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Tyranids Monster unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test and, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that Battle-shock test was failed, subtract 1 from the Wound roll as well.

strats.name: Swarm-guided Salvoes
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Tyranids Monster unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and until the end of the phase each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that model's Ballistic Skill characteristic and any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

strats.name: Untrammelled Ferocity
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Tyranids Monster unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can move through enemy models as if they were friendly models, and until the end of the phase any Desperate Escape tests those models must take are automatically passed.

strats.name: Imperative Dominance
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Tyranids unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army.
strats.effect_rules: Select one Synaptic Imperative, even if you have already selected that imperative this battle. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Synaptic Imperative is active for your unit instead of any other Synaptic Imperative that is active for your army.

strats.name: Irresistible Will
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Synapse unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy unit within 24" of and visible to the Synapse unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly Tyranids model makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, if the attacking model's unit is within 6" of your Synapse unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

strats.name: Override Instincts
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Tyranids unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army and made a Fall Back move this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge this turn.

strats.name: Reinforced Hive Node
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Synapse unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

strats.name: Synaptic Channelling
strats.when_rules: Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Synapse unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, while a friendly Tyranids unit is within 9" of the selected unit, that unit is within Synapse Range of your army.

strats.name: The Smothering Shadow
strats.when_rules: Any phase, just after an enemy unit fails a Battle-shock test.
strats.target_rules: One Synapse unit from your army within 12" of that enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Roll six D6: for each 3+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

strats.name: Bounding Advance
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Endless Multitude unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

strats.name: Preservation Imperative
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Endless Multitude unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, your unit is treated as containing fewer than five models for the purpose of the [BLAST] ability.

strats.name: Swarming Masses
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Endless Multitude unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and If your unit contains 15 or more models, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

strats.name: Synaptic Goading
strats.when_rules: Any phase, just before an Endless Multitude unit from your army that is within Synapse Range of your army makes a Surge move.
strats.target_rules: That Endless Multitude unit
strats.effect_rules: When making that Surge move, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit moves, and your unit can end that move as close as possible to the closest objective marker (instead of as close as possible to the closest enemy unit). All other rules for making Surge moves still apply.

strats.name: Teeming Masses
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Endless Multitude unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

strats.name: Unending Waves
strats.when_rules: Any phase.
strats.target_rules: One Endless Multitude unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength.
strats.restriction_rules: Any destroyed Character units that were attached to your unit are not returned.

strats.name: Aggressor Imperative
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Skitarii unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase. If that unit is Battleline, you can also target one friendly Skitarii unit (excluding Battleline units) within 6" of it.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time one of those units Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.

strats.name: Baleful Halo
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Mechanicus unit from your army (excluding Vehicle units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. If that unit is Battleline, you can also target one friendly Skitarii unit (excluding Battleline units) within 6" of it.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets one of those units from your army, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

strats.name: Bulwark Imperative
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Skitarii unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. If that unit is Battleline, you can also target one friendly Skitarii unit (excluding Battleline units) within 6" of it.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, models in those units from your army have a 4+ invulnerable save.

strats.name: Extinction Order
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Tech-Priest model from your army and one objective marker within 24" of that model.
strats.effect_rules: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within range of that objective marker. On a 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound and must take a Battle-shock test.

strats.name: Lethal Dosage
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Mechanicus unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

strats.name: Pre-calibrated Purge Solution
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Mechanicus unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase. If that unit is Battleline, you can also target one friendly Skitarii unit (excluding Battleline units) within 6" of it.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of those units makes a ranged attack, if the target of that attack is within your opponent's deployment zone, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

strats.name: Chant of the Remorseless Fist
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Cult Mechanicus unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a Cult Mechanicus model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

strats.name: Incantation of the Iron Soul
strats.when_rules: Any phase, just after you allocate a mortal wound to a Cult Mechanicus model from your army.
strats.target_rules: That Cult Mechanicus model's unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, Cult Mechanicus models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

strats.name: Litany of the Electromancer
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Cult Mechanicus unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of one or more Cult Mechanicus models in your unit, adding 1 to the result if that model is an Electro-Priest. On a 5+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

strats.name: Luminescent Blessing
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Cult Mechanicus unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, Cult Mechanicus models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

strats.name: Tribute of Emphatic Veneration
strats.when_rules: Start of your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Cult Mechanicus unit from your army and one enemy unit within 18" of it.
strats.effect_rules: That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that test is failed, until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

strats.name: Verse of Vengeance
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Cult Mechanicus unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a Cult Mechanicus model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

strats.name: Auto-oracular Retrieval
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Mechanicus unit from your army that disembarked from a Transport this turn.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of your Acquisition objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll.

strats.name: Cached Acquisition
strats.when_rules: Any phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Mechanicus unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of an objective marker you controlled. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

strats.name: Incense Exhausts
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Mechanicus Infantry unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks, and one friendly Adeptus Mechanicus Smoke unit within 6" of it.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, both of those units have the Stealth ability and the Benefit of Cover.

strats.name: Infoslave Skull
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Tech-Priest model from your army and one objective marker within 24" of that model (excluding your Acquisition objective marker).
strats.effect_rules: Until the start of your next Command phase, that objective marker is also considered to be one of your Acquisition objective markers for all rules purposes.

strats.name: Priority Reclamation
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just before an Adeptus Mechanicus unit from your army Consolidates.
strats.target_rules: That Adeptus Mechanicus unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3", provided your unit ends that Consolidation move within range of your Acquisition objective marker.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot target a unit with this Stratagem if it is within 3" of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Reactive Safeguard
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Mechanicus Infantry unit from your army within range of your Acquisition objective marker that was selected as a target of that charge, and one friendly Adeptus Mechanicus Transport.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can embark within that Transport.
strats.restriction_rules: Every model in your unit must be within 3" of that Transport and there must be sufficient transport capacity to embark the entire unit.

strats.name: Auto-divinatory Targeting
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Legio Cybernetica or Adeptus Mechanicus Vehicle unit from your army, and one objective marker.
strats.effect_rules: Until the start of your next Command phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have a Ballistic Skill characteristic of 3+ and the [IGNORES COVER] ability, but they can only target units within range of the selected objective marker.

strats.name: Benevolence of the Omnissiah
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Legio Cybernetica or Adeptus Mechanicus Vehicle unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the start of your next Command phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability, which is improved to Feel No Pain 5+ against mortal wounds.

strats.name: Machine Spirit Resurgent
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Legio Cybernetica or Adeptus Mechanicus Vehicle unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
strats.effect_rules: Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll. If your unit is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

strats.name: Machine Superiority
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Legio Cybernetica or Adeptus Mechanicus Vehicle unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back and you can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

strats.name: Motive Imperative
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Adeptus Mechanicus Vehicle unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 3" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit and add 1 to Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

strats.name: Transcendent Cogitation
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Legio Cybernetica or Adeptus Mechanicus Vehicle unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the start of your next Command phase, the Conqueror Imperative and Protector Imperative are both active for your unit.

strats.name: Binharic Offence
strats.when_rules: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: Two Skitarii units from your army that have not been selected to shoot or fight this phase, and one enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in both of your units by 1.
strats.restriction_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in either of your units makes an attack, it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

strats.name: Bionic Endurance
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Sicarian, Pteraxii or Sydonian unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

strats.name: Expedited Purge Protocol
strats.when_rules: Your Charge phase.
strats.target_rules: One Skitarii unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

strats.name: Isolate and Destroy
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Sicarian, Pteraxii, Sydonian, Ironstrider Ballistarii or Skitarii Mounted unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if there are no other enemy units within 6" of the unit targeted by that attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

strats.name: Programmed Withdrawal
strats.when_rules: End of your opponent's Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: Up to two Sicarian units from your army, or one Skitarii Infantry or Skitarii Mounted unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
strats.restriction_rules: Each unit targeted with this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy units.

strats.name: Shroud Protocols
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Skitarii Infantry unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 12".

strats.name: Protocol of the Conquering Tyrant
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Necrons unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within half range, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If a Necrons Character is leading your unit, until the end of the phase, you can re-roll the Hit roll for that attack instead.

strats.name: Protocol of the Eternal Revenant
strats.when_rules: Any phase.
strats.target_rules: One Necrons Infantry Character model from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: At the end of the phase, set your model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with half of its starting number of wounds remaining.
strats.restriction_rules: Each model can only be targeted with this Stratagem once per battle.

strats.name: Protocol of the Hungry Void
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Necrons unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. In addition, if a Necrons Character is leading your unit, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1 (this is not cumulative with any other modifiers that improve Armour Penetration).

strats.name: Protocol of the Sudden Storm
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Necrons unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the turn, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability. In addition, if a Necrons Character is leading your unit, until the end of the phase, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for your unit.

strats.name: Protocol of the Undying Legions
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
strats.target_rules: One Necrons unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit activates its Reanimation Protocols and reanimates D3 wounds (or D3+1 wounds if a Necrons Character is leading your unit).

strats.name: Protocol of the Vengeful Stars
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit destroys a Necrons unit from your army.
strats.target_rules: One Necrons Character unit from your army that was within 6" of that Necrons unit when it was destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: After the attacking unit has resolved its attacks, your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

strats.name: Blood-fuelled Cruelty
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Fall Back move.
strats.target_rules: One Destroyer Cult or Flayed Ones unit from your army that started the phase within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds. Your unit can then make a Normal move, but must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit.

strats.name: Insanity's Ire
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
strats.target_rules: One Destroyer Cult or Flayed Ones unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed by the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move, but must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit.

strats.name: Masks of Death
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Destroyer Cult or Flayed Ones unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

strats.name: Murderous Reanimation
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Destroyer Cult or Flayed Ones unit from your army that has just destroyed an enemy unit, or just caused an enemy unit that was not Below Half-strength to become Below Half-strength.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit's Reanimation Protocols activate.

strats.name: Pitiless Hunters
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Destroyer Cult or Flayed Ones unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

strats.name: The Spoor of Frailty
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Destroyer Cult or Flayed Ones unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model from your unit makes an attack that targets a unit below Starting Strength, add 1 to the Hit roll. If the target is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well

strats.name: Cosmic Precision
strats.when_rules: Your Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One Necrons unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike or Hyperphasing abilities this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 3" horizontally away from all enemy models.
strats.restriction_rules: A unit targeted with this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

strats.name: Dimensional Corridor
strats.when_rules: Your Charge phase.
strats.target_rules: One Necrons unit from your army that was set up on the battlefield this turn using the Eternity Gate ability of a Monolith model that started the turn on the battlefield.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit is eligible to charge this phase.

strats.name: Entropic Damping
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Titanic model from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks and is within 18" of the attacking unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in the attacking unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

strats.name: Hyperphasic Recall
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.
strats.target_rules: One Necrons Infantry unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit's attacks and one friendly Monolith model.
strats.effect_rules: Remove your Infantry unit from the battlefield and then set it back up anywhere on the battlefield that is wholly within 6" of your Monolith model and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

strats.name: Quantum Deflection
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Necrons Vehicle unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

strats.name: Reanimation Crypts
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: Your Necrons Warlord.
strats.effect_rules: For each of your Necrons units in Reserves, that Reserves unit's Reanimation Protocols activate.

strats.name: Countertemporal Shift
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Canoptek unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 12".

strats.name: Curse of the Cryptek
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.
strats.target_rules: One Cryptek model from your army that was destroyed by one of the attacking unit's attacks. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly Canoptek model makes an attack that targets the attacking unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

strats.name: Cynosure of Eradication
strats.when_rules: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Cryptek or Canoptek unit from your army that is wholly within your army's Power Matrix.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by Cryptek or Canoptek models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

strats.name: Reactive Subroutines
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
strats.target_rules: One Canoptek unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

strats.name: Solar Pulse
strats.when_rules: Start of your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Cryptek model from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Select one objective marker within 18" of your Cryptek model. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by friendly Necrons models have the [IGNORES COVER] ability while targeting units within range of that objective marker.

strats.name: Suboptimal Facade
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
strats.target_rules: One Canoptek unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge and is wholly within your army's Power Matrix.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit's Reanimation Protocols activate.

strats.name: Enslaved Artifice
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Necrons unit from your army (excluding Titanic units) that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

strats.name: Nanoassembly Protocols
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Necrons Vehicle unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

strats.name: Sentinels of Eternity
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Lychguard or Triarch Praetorians unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

strats.name: Suffer No Rival
strats.when_rules: Fight phase.
strats.target_rules: One Lychguard or Triarch unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

strats.name: Territorial Obsession
strats.when_rules: Your Command phase.
strats.target_rules: One Lychguard or Triarch unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit. If your unit has the Vehicle keyword, add 3 to the Objective Control characteristic instead.

strats.name: Your Time Is Nigh
strats.when_rules: Any phase, just after your opponent's Warlord is destroyed.
strats.target_rules: Your Necrons Warlord.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the battle, each time an enemy unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, subtract 1 from the result.

strats.name: Command Re-roll
strats.when_rules: Any phase, just after you make an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test or a Hazardous test for a unit from your army, or a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll or a saving throw for a model in that unit, or a roll to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon equipped by a model in that unit.
strats.target_rules: That unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.

strats.name: Counter-Offensive
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought.
strats.target_rules: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit fights next.

strats.name: Epic Challenge
strats.when_rules: Fight phase, when a Character unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight.
strats.target_rules: One Character model in your unit.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.

strats.name: Fire Overwatch
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move.
strats.target_rules: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase.
strats.effect_rules: If that enemy unit is visible to your unit, your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot target a Titanic unit with this Stratagem. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon's Ballistic Skill or any modifiers. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

strats.name: Go To Ground
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Infantry unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.

strats.name: Grenade
strats.when_rules: Your Shooting phase.
strats.target_rules: One Grenades unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
strats.effect_rules: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your Grenades unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

strats.name: Heroic Intervention
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
strats.target_rules: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
strats.restriction_rules: You can only select a Vehicle unit from your army if it is a Walker. Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

strats.name: Insane Bravery
strats.when_rules: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just before you take a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army.
strats.target_rules: A unit from your army that must take a Battle-shock test.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit automatically passes that Battle-shock test.
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot use this Stratagem more than once per battle.

strats.name: Rapid Ingress
strats.when_rules: End of your opponent's Movement phase.
strats.target_rules: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
strats.effect_rules: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, and if every model in that unit has the Deep Strike ability, you can set that unit up as described in the Deep Strike ability (even though it is not your Movement phase).
strats.restriction_rules: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive on the battlefield during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

strats.name: Smokescreen
strats.when_rules: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
strats.target_rules: One Smoke unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have the Benefit of Cover and the Stealth ability.

strats.name: Tank Shock
strats.when_rules: Your Charge phase.
strats.target_rules: One Vehicle unit from your army.
strats.effect_rules: Until the end of the phase, after your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).
